analyzed: ▁hetu du ka ▁ micch att a niyat attika

original: Hetuṁ micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
analyzed: ▁hetu ṃ ▁ micch att a niyat aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu ▁na micch att aniy ato ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁sabbattha ▁tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
analyzed: ▁hetu ṃ ▁sammat ta niyat aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu ▁na sam matt aniy ato ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁sabbattha ▁tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁nahetu ṃ ▁a niyat aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paccayā ▁nan ahetu ▁na aniy ato ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi
